original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business needs and technical solutions, requiring a unique blend of business acumen, analytical prowess, and technical proficiency. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for understanding complex business processes and translating them into effective system configurations that drive efficiency and accuracy. Your ability to collaborate with stakeholders, analyze data, and identify opportunities for improvement will be instrumental in shaping the future of our vehicle configuration systems.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders to gather detailed business requirements and document them using industry-standard techniques
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting any issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging tools like database querying and data visualization
- Propose and implement process improvements and best practices to streamline business operations and enhance system efficiency
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and address complex business challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively liaise with technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in Java and SQL to develop and maintain system configurations

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to develop innovative solutions
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies to streamline project delivery
- Knowledge of vehicle configuration processes and best practices

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a similar role, blending business analysis and technical configuration
- Proven track record of successfully translating business requirements into effective system configurations

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile environment and collaborating with cross-functional teams
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and processes

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] for backend configuration
- SQL and database querying tools for data analysis
- Data visualization and reporting tools
- Agile project management software

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative and fast-paced work environment, with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation
- Ability to work closely with business stakeholders to understand their needs and translate them into technical solutions
- Proactive approach to identifying and addressing process inefficiencies and opportunities for optimization
- Strong problem-solving skills to troubleshoot and resolve configuration-related issues

Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business strategy and technical execution, requiring a unique blend of analytical thinking, technical proficiency, and a deep understanding of complex business processes. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for translating the organization's strategic vision into effective system configurations that drive efficiency, accuracy, and innovation within the vehicle configuration space. Your ability to collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders, analyze data, and identify opportunities for improvement will be instrumental in shaping the future of our systems and processes.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with business stakeholders across various departments to understand their needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques
- Leverage your technical expertise to translate business requirements into seamless system configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, and implementing and testing new configurations
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing advanced data analysis and visualization tools to uncover insights and drive informed decision-making
- Propose and implement innovative process improvements and best practices to streamline business operations and enhance system efficiency, leveraging your knowledge of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) techniques
- Ensure thorough testing of configurations to verify they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and seamless ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and address complex business challenges
- Strong communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to effectively liaise with technical and non-technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Expertise in Java and SQL to develop and maintain robust system configurations

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to develop innovative, data-driven solutions
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies to streamline project delivery and foster a culture of continuous improvement
- Knowledge of vehicle configuration processes and best practices to provide industry-specific insights

Required Experience:
- Minimum 5 years of experience in a similar role, blending business analysis, technical configuration, and data-driven decision-making
- Proven track record of successfully translating business requirements into effective, scalable system configurations

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile environment and collaborating with cross-functional teams to drive strategic initiatives
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and processes, with a demonstrated ability to optimize operations and enhance user experience

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] for backend configuration
- Advanced data analysis and visualization tools for identifying insights and trends
- Machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) platforms for developing innovative solutions
- Agile project management software to streamline collaboration and delivery

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Dynamic, fast-paced work environment with a focus on continuous improvement and innovation
- Ability to work closely with business stakeholders to deeply understand their needs and translate them into transformative technical solutions
- Proactive approach to identifying and addressing process inefficiencies and opportunities for optimization, leveraging data-driven insights
- Strong problem-solving skills to troubleshoot and resolve complex, mission-critical configuration-related issues

Role Overview:
This role is a strategic partner in driving the evolution of our vehicle configuration systems, blending deep technical expertise with a keen understanding of business processes and emerging industry trends. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for translating the organization's ambitious vision into innovative system configurations that enhance efficiency, accuracy, and user experience. Your ability to collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders, leverage data-driven insights, and identify transformative opportunities will be instrumental in shaping the future of our technology landscape.

Key Responsibilities:
- Proactively engage with business stakeholders across various departments to deeply understand their evolving needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-leading techniques
- Leverage your technical prowess to design and implement seamless system configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and optimizing data mappings and integrations, and implementing and testing cutting-edge solutions
- Analyze complex data sets to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing advanced analytics and visualization tools to generate actionable insights that drive strategic decision-making
- Propose and spearhead innovative process improvements and best practices, leveraging your expertise in machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to develop transformative solutions that enhance business operations and system efficiency
- Ensure thorough testing of configurations to validate they meet requirements and function as expected, actively leading user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions and gather feedback
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations, future enhancements, and knowledge sharing
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless implementation and provide expert-level guidance for ongoing support and optimization of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and address complex, cross-functional business challenges
- Exceptional communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to effectively engage with technical and non-technical stakeholders at all levels
- Proven expertise in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Mastery of Java and SQL to design, develop, and maintain robust, scalable system configurations

Preferred Skills:
- Advanced expertise in machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to develop innovative, data-driven solutions
- Extensive experience with Agile methodologies to drive continuous improvement and foster a culture of innovation
- Deep knowledge of vehicle configuration processes and best practices to provide industry-leading insights

Required Experience:
- Minimum 7-10 years of experience in a similar role, blending strategic business analysis, technical configuration, and data-driven decision-making
- Proven track record of successfully translating ambitious business requirements into transformative, industry-leading system configurations

Preferred Experience:
- Extensive experience working in an Agile environment and collaborating with cross-functional teams to drive strategic initiatives
- Recognized industry expertise in vehicle configuration systems and processes, with a demonstrated ability to optimize operations and enhance user experience

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] for backend configuration
- Advanced data analysis and visualization tools for extracting valuable insights
- Machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) platforms for developing innovative, data-driven solutions
- Agile project management software to streamline collaboration and delivery

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Dynamic, fast-paced work environment with a strong focus on continuous improvement, innovation, and strategic impact
- Ability to work closely with business stakeholders to deeply understand their evolving needs and translate them into transformative technical solutions
- Proactive approach to identifying and addressing process inefficiencies and opportunities for optimization, leveraging data-driven insights and industry expertise
- Strong problem-solving skills to troubleshoot and resolve complex, mission-critical configuration-related issues, providing expert-level guidance and support
